mapper.insert: insert into sport_module_${tbName} (resource_id, sprot_group_id, team_name1, team_name2, deail_pd, game_time,game_type, create_time) values (#{sportGame.resourceId}, #{sportGame.sprotGroupId}, #{sportGame.teamName1}, #{sportGame.teamName2}, #{sportGame.deailPd}, #{sportGame.gameTime}, #{sportGame.gameType}, now())
